p.k: Speechless on the Seine / Poles Apart While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime. / A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson land on the North Pole instead. But Ben quickly discovers the culprits, magnetically-powered scientists.
